title: IT firms upbeat on BFSI discretionary spends takeoff
description: The BFSI (banking, financial services and insurance) sector, the largest revenue generator for the Indian IT industry, is the biggest technology spender. While some experts point to an increase in discretionary spending linked to regulatory compliance, others highlight that projects previously on hold are resuming.

While some experts point to an increase in discretionary spending linked to regulatory compliance, others highlight that projects previously on hold are resuming. Also, there is a push from enterprises to invest in artificial intelligence, with a focus on driving productivity and gaining competitive advantages.
